participants.name: Sara Sullivan
participants.title: Talent Lead @ #6 Best Consulting Firms To Work For'

messages.message:
Hi Brian,
I wanted to see if you're still looking for Engineering opportunities, specifically in Denver. Your background and experience is great and exactly what we're looking for at CapTech. Let me know if you can chat next week.
Thanks,
Sara Sullivan
804-545-8728 | ssullivan@captechconsulting.com

Hi Brian, 
Thanks for connecting. Do you have time this week to have a quick call?
Thanks,
Sara Sullivan
804-545-8728 | ssullivan@captechconsulting.com
